actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To amend title 44, United States Code, to repeal the National Historical Publications and Records Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013

summary.text: Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013 - Repeals provisions creating the National Historical Publications and Records Commission and its grant-making authority.

titles.title: Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013
To amend title 44, United States Code, to repeal the National Historical Publications and Records Commission, and for other purposes.
